title: Delete COMPANY-has-brand Relationship
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to be able to disconnect BRANDS from COMPANIES\
So I can clean up bad data or test data
description:
* The ›has-brand‹ relationship is deleted when it actually exists. -> Status Code \`204\`
* A successful request returns with an empty body.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* Requests are rejected when there exists no ›has-brand‹ relationship between the provided nodes. -> Status Code \`404\`
